Popular shortcuts.keyName: Open the Color Settings dialog box
Open the Keyboard Shortcuts dialog box

Work with documents.keyName: Create a document from a template
Create a document without opening the New Document dialog box

Work with documents.keyName: Place a file in the document
Open the File Information dialog box

Work with documents.keyName: Save changes made to the document
Work with documents.keyTrans: 保存对文档所做的更改

Work with documents.keyName: Open the Save As dialog box
Save a copy of the document
Save the document as script files

Work with documents.keyName: Open the Save For Web dialog box

Select tools.keyName: Switch to Smooth tool while using Blob Brush tool
Select tools.keyTrans: 使用 Blob Brush 工具时切换到平滑工具

View artwork.keyName: Toggle between screen modes: Normal Screen Mode, Full Screen Mode with Menu Bar, Full Screen Mode
View artwork.keyTrans: 在屏幕模式之间切换 正常屏幕模式、带菜单栏的全屏模式、全屏模式

View artwork.keyValue: Double-click Zoom tool or press Ctrl + 1

View artwork.keyName: Switch to Hand tool (when not in text-edit mode)
View artwork.keyTrans: 切换到手形工具（不在文本编辑模式时）

View artwork.keyName: Switch to Zoom tool in magnify mode
View artwork.keyTrans: 在放大模式下切换到缩放工具

View artwork.keyName: Switch to Zoom tool in reduce mode
View artwork.keyTrans: 在缩小模式下切换到缩放工具

View artwork.keyName: Move Zoom marquee while dragging with the Zoom tool
View artwork.keyTrans: 使用缩放工具拖动时移动缩放范围

View artwork.keyName: Convert between horizontal and vertical guide
View artwork.keyTrans: 在水平和垂直导引之间转换
在窗口中查看所有画板

View artwork.keyName: Paste in place on the active artboard
View artwork.keyTrans: 在活动画板上粘贴到位
在另一个画板内创建画板

View artwork.keyName: Select multiple artboards in the Artboards panel
View artwork.keyTrans: 在 “画板 ”面板中选择多个画板

View artwork.keyName: Toggle between Outline and GPU Preview of the document
View artwork.keyTrans: 在文档的大纲预览和 GPU 预览之间切换

View artwork.keyName: Toggle between GPU and CPU Preview of the document
View artwork.keyTrans: 在文档的 GPU 和 CPU 预览之间切换

View artwork.keyName: View the document in Overprint Preview mode
View artwork.keyTrans: 以叠印预览模式查看文档

View artwork.keyName: View the document in Pixel Preview mode
View artwork.keyTrans: 在像素预览模式下查看文档

Work with selections.keyName: Switch to last-used selection tool (Selection tool, Direct Selection tool, or Group Selection tool)
Work with selections.keyTrans: 切换到上次使用的选择工具（选择工具、直接选择工具或组选择工具）

Work with selections.keyName: Switch between Direct Selection tool and Group Selection tool
Work with selections.keyTrans: 在直接选择工具和群组选择工具之间切换

Work with selections.keyName: Add to a selection with Selection tool, Direct Selection tool, Group Selection tool, Live Paint Selection tool, or Magic Wand tool
Work with selections.keyTrans: 使用选择工具、直接选择工具、组选择工具、实时绘制选择工具或魔棒工具添加选区

Work with selections.keyName: Subtract a selection with Selection tool, Direct Selection tool, Group Selection tool, or LIve Paint Selection tool
Work with selections.keyTrans: 使用选择工具、直接选择工具、组选择工具或实时绘制选择工具减去选区

Work with selections.keyName: Subtract from selection with Magic Wand tool
Work with selections.keyTrans: 用魔棒工具从选区中减去

Work with selections.keyTrans: 用套索工具添加选区

Work with selections.keyName: Subtract from selection with Lasso tool
Work with selections.keyTrans: 用套索工具从选区中减去

Work with selections.keyTrans: 将指针更改为套索工具的十字指针

Work with selections.keyTrans: 在选定对象周围创建裁剪标记

Work with selections.keyTrans: 选择当前选区上方的对象

Work with selections.keyTrans: 选择当前选区下方的对象

对选中的图样进行分组

Work with selections.keyTrans: 锁定所有取消选择的图样

Work with selections.keyName: Constrain movement to 45° angle (except when using Reflect tool)
Work with selections.keyTrans: 限制移动角度为 45°（使用反射工具时除外）
将选区向前移动

Work with selections.keyName: Move a selection to the front
Work with selections.keyTrans: 将选区向前移动
向后移动选区

Work with selections.keyName: Move a selection to the back
Work with selections.keyTrans: 将选区向后移动

Draw.keyName: Constrain a shape’s proportions or orientation to:
Draw.keyTrans: 将形状的比例或方向限制为

Draw.keyName: equal height and width for rectangles, rounded rectangles, ellipses, and grids
Draw.keyTrans: 矩形、圆角矩形、椭圆和网格的高度和宽度相等

Draw.keyName: Increments of 45° for line and arc segments
Draw.keyTrans: 线段和弧段的增量为 45

Draw.keyName: Original orientation for polygons, stars, and flares
Draw.keyTrans: 多边形、星形和耀斑的原始方向

Draw.keyName: Move a shape while drawing it
Draw.keyTrans: 在绘制图形时移动图形

Draw.keyName: Draw from the center of a shape (except for polygons, stars, and flares)
Draw.keyTrans: 从形状中心开始绘制（多边形、星形和耀斑除外）

Draw.keyName: Increase or decrease polygon sides, star points, arc angle, spiral winds, or flare rays
Draw.keyTrans: 增加或减少多边形边、星点、弧角、螺旋风或耀斑射线
Draw.keyValue: Start dragging, then press the Up Arrow or Down Arrow

Draw.keyName: Keep the inner radius of a star constant
Draw.keyTrans: 保持恒星的内半径不变
Draw.keyValue: Start dragging, then hold down Ctrl

Draw.keyName: Keep the sides of a star straight
Draw.keyTrans: 保持恒星边线平直

Draw.keyName: Switch between an open and closed arc
Draw.keyTrans: 在开放弧和封闭弧之间切换
Draw.keyValue: Start dragging, then hold down C

Draw.keyName: Flip an arc, keeping the reference point constant
Draw.keyTrans: 翻转弧线，保持参考点不变
Draw.keyValue: Start dragging, then hold down F

Draw.keyName: Add or subtract winds from a spiral while increasing the length of the spiral
Draw.keyTrans: 在增加螺旋长度的同时增加或减少螺旋风

Draw.keyName: Change the decay rate of a spiral
Draw.keyTrans: 改变螺旋的衰减速度

Draw.keyName: Add or remove horizontal lines from a rectangular grid or concentric lines from a polar grid
Draw.keyTrans: 从矩形网格中添加或删除水平线，或从极坐标网格中添加或删除同心圆线
Draw.keyValue: Start dragging, then press the Up Arrow or Down Arrow

Draw.keyName: Add or remove vertical lines from a rectangular grid or radial lines from a polar grid
Draw.keyTrans: 添加或删除矩形网格中的垂直线或极坐标网格中的放射线
Draw.keyValue: Start dragging, then press the Right Arrow or Left Arrow

Draw.keyName: Decrease the skew value for horizontal dividers in a rectangular grid or radial dividers in a polar grid by 10%
Draw.keyTrans: 将矩形网格中水平分割线或极坐标网格中径向分割线的倾斜值减少 10

Draw.keyName: Increase the skew value for horizontal dividers in a rectangular grid or radial dividers in a polar grid by 10%
Draw.keyTrans: 将矩形网格中水平分隔线或极坐标网格中径向分隔线的倾斜值增加 10

Draw.keyName: Decrease the skew value for vertical dividers in a rectangular grid or concentric dividers in a polar grid by 10%
Draw.keyTrans: 将矩形网格中垂直分线器或极坐标网格中同心分线器的偏斜值减少 10

Draw.keyName: Increase the skew value for vertical dividers in a rectangular grid or concentric dividers in a polar grid by 10%
Draw.keyTrans: 将矩形网格中垂直分隔线或极坐标网格中同心分隔线的倾斜值增加 10

Draw.keyName: Increase size of Blob Brush
Draw.keyTrans: 增加 Blob Brush 的大小

Draw.keyName: Decrease size of Blob Brush
Draw.keyTrans: 减小 Blob Brush 的大小

Draw.keyName: Constrain Blob Brush path horizontally or vertically
Draw.keyTrans: 水平或垂直限制 Blob Brush 路径

Draw.keyName: Switch through drawing modes
Draw.keyTrans: 切换绘图模式

Draw.keyName: Join two or more paths
Draw.keyTrans: 连接两条或多条路径
Draw.keyValue: Select the paths, then press Ctrl + J

Draw.keyName: Average two or more paths
Draw.keyTrans: 平均两个或多个路径
Draw.keyValue: Select the paths, then press Alt + Ctrl + J

Draw.keyName: Create corner or smooth join
Draw.keyTrans: 创建转角或平滑连接
Draw.keyValue: Select the paths, then press Shift + Ctrl + Alt + J

Draw.keyName: Create a compound path
Draw.keyTrans: 创建复合路径

Draw.keyName: Release a compound path
Draw.keyTrans: 释放复合路径

Draw.keyName: Edit a pattern
Draw.keyTrans: 编辑图案

Draw.keyName: Perspective Grid Tool
Draw.keyTrans: 透视网格工具

Draw.keyName: Perspective Selection Tool
Draw.keyTrans: 透视选择工具

Draw.keyName: Perspective Grid
Draw.keyTrans: 透视网格

Draw.keyName: Moving objects perpendicularly
Draw.keyTrans: 垂直移动对象
Draw.keyValue: Press the number 5 key, then click and drag the object

Draw.keyName: Switching perspective planes
Draw.keyTrans: 切换透视平面
Draw.keyValue: Use the Perspective Selection tool and then press 1 for left grid, 2 for horizontal grid, 3 for right grid, or 4 for no active grid

Draw.keyName: Copying objects in perspective
Draw.keyTrans: 在透视中复制对象

Draw.keyName: Repeat transforming objects in perspective
Draw.keyTrans: 在透视图中重复变换对象

Draw.keyName: Switching between drawing modes
Draw.keyTrans: 切换绘图模式

Edit shapes.keyTrans: 将钢笔工具切换为转换锚点工具

Edit shapes.keyTrans: 在添加锚点工具和删除锚点工具之间切换

Edit shapes.keyName: Switch Scissors tool to Add Anchor Point tool
Edit shapes.keyTrans: 将剪刀工具切换为添加锚点工具

Edit shapes.keyName: Switch Pencil tool to Smooth tool
Edit shapes.keyTrans: 将铅笔工具切换为平滑工具

Edit shapes.keyName: Move current anchor point while drawing with Pen tool
Edit shapes.keyTrans: 使用钢笔工具绘图时移动当前锚点

Edit shapes.keyName: Cut a straight line with Knife tool
Cut at 45° or 90° with Knife tool

Edit shapes.keyName: Use shape mode buttons in Pathfinder panel to create compound paths
Edit shapes.keyTrans: 使用探路者面板中的形状模式按钮创建复合路径

Edit shapes.keyName: Erase unwanted closed regions created using Shape Builder tool

Edit shapes.keyName: Display rectangular marquee to easily merge multiple paths (when using Shape Builder tool)
Edit shapes.keyTrans: 显示矩形标线，轻松合并多个路径（使用形状创建工具时）

Edit shapes.keyName: Increase the intensity of symbols (when using Symbolism tool)
Edit shapes.keyTrans: 增加符号的强度（使用符号工具时）

Distort objects using a warp-shaped envelope

Work with Live Paint groups.keyTrans: 切换到滴管工具并对填充和/或描边进行取样

Work with Live Paint groups.keyTrans: 将未涂抹的边缘填充到相邻的面上

Work with Live Paint groups.keyName: Fill all faces that have same fill and stroke all edges that have same stroke
Work with Live Paint groups.keyTrans: 填充具有相同填充的所有面，描边具有相同描边的所有边缘

Work with Live Paint groups.keyName: Switch to Eyedropper tool and sample fill and/or stroke
Work with Live Paint groups.keyTrans: 切换到滴管工具并取样填充和/或描边

Work with Live Paint groups.keyName: Switch to Eyedropper tool and sample color from an image or intermediate color from a gradient
Work with Live Paint groups.keyTrans: 切换到吸管工具，从图像中取样颜色或从渐变中取样中间色

Work with Live Paint groups.keyName: Select all faces/edges with same fill/stroke
Work with Live Paint groups.keyTrans: 选择所有具有相同填充/笔触的面/边

Work with type.keyTrans: 逐级增大或缩小字体大小

Work with type.keyTrans: 增加或减少字距和跟踪

Work with type.keyTrans: 五倍增加或减少字尖和跟踪

Alt + Shift + Up or Down Arrow (horizontal text) or Right or Left Arrow (vertical text)

Work with type.keyName: Switch between Type and Vertical Type, Area Type and Vertical Area Type, and Path Type and Vertical Path Type tools
Work with type.keyTrans: 在 “类型 ”和 “垂直类型”、“区域类型 ”和 “垂直区域类型 ”以及 “路径类型 ”和 “垂直路径类型 ”工具之间切换

Work with type.keyTrans: 在 “区域类型 ”和 “路径类型”、“垂直区域类型 ”和 “垂直路径类型 ”工具之间切换

Use panels.keyName: Set options (except for Actions, Brushes, Swatches, and Symbols panels)
Use panels.keyTrans: 设置选项（“操作”、“笔刷”、“色板 ”和 “符号 ”面板除外）

Use panels.keyName: Delete without confirmation (except for Layers panel)
Use panels.keyTrans: 无需确认即可删除（图层面板除外）

Use panels.keyName: Apply value and keep text box active
Use panels.keyTrans: 应用数值并保持文本框处于活动状态

Use panels.keyTrans: 选择操作、画笔、图层、链接、样式或色板的范围

Use panels.keyTrans: 选择非连续的操作、画笔、图层（仅限同一级别）、链接、样式或色标

Use panels.keyName: Show/Hide all panels except the Tools panel and Control panel

Character and Paragraph panels.keyName: Increase/decrease the selected value by a fraction

Layers panel.keyName: Select all objects on the layer
Layers panel.keyTrans: 选择图层上的所有对象

Layers panel.keyName: Show/hide all layers but the selected one
Layers panel.keyTrans: 显示/隐藏除选定图层以外的所有图层

Layers panel.keyName: Select Outline/Preview view for the selected layer
Layers panel.keyTrans: 为选定图层选择轮廓/预览视图

Layers panel.keyName: Selects Outline/Preview view for all other layers
Layers panel.keyTrans: 为所有其他图层选择轮廓/预览视图
锁定/解锁所有其他图层

Layers panel.keyName: Expand all sublayers to display entire hierarchy
Layers panel.keyTrans: 展开所有子图层以显示整个层次结构

Layers panel.keyName: Set options as you create new layer
Layers panel.keyTrans: 创建新图层时设置选项

Layers panel.keyName: Set options as you create new sublayer
Layers panel.keyTrans: 创建新子图层时设置选项

Layers panel.keyName: Place new sublayer at bottom of layer list
Layers panel.keyTrans: 将新子图层置于图层列表底部

Layers panel.keyName: Place layer at top of layer list
Layers panel.keyTrans: 将图层置于图层列表顶部
将图层放在所选图层的下方

Layers panel.keyName: Copy the selection to a layer, sublayer, or group
Layers panel.keyTrans: 将选区复制到图层、子图层或组

Swatches panel.keyTrans: 用另一个色板替换色板

Transform panel.keyName: Apply a value and keep focus in edit field
Transform panel.keyTrans: 应用数值并将焦点保持在编辑栏中

Transform panel.keyName: Apply a value and copy object
Apply a value and scale option proportionately for width or height
Transform panel.keyTrans: 应用数值并按比例缩放选项的宽度或高度

Transparency panel.keyName: Apply last effect to the selected object
Transparency panel.keyTrans: 对选定对象应用最后效果

Transparency panel.keyName: Apply last effect to the selected object by adjusting the values in the effects dialog box
Transparency panel.keyTrans: 通过调整效果对话框中的值，将最后一种效果应用到所选对象

Transparency panel.keyName: Change mask to grayscale image for editing
Transparency panel.keyTrans: 将遮罩更改为灰度图像以便编辑
以 1%的增量增加/减少不透明度
Transparency panel.keyValue: Click opacity field + Up Arrow or Down Arrow

Transparency panel.keyTrans: 以 10%的增量增加/减少不透明度
Transparency panel.keyValue: Shift-click opacity field + Up Arrow or Down Arrow

Function keys.keyTrans: 显示/隐藏 梯度面板
显示/隐藏图形样式面板
显示/隐藏 对齐面板
显示/隐藏 变换面板
